name: Google
about: Google is a global leader in search, advertising, cloud computing, and more.

name: Microsoft
about: Microsoft develops software, hardware, and cloud services, best known for Windows and Office.

name: Apple
about: Apple designs and sells consumer electronics, software, and online services, including the iPhone and Mac.

name: Amazon
about: Amazon is the world's largest online retailer and a major provider of cloud services.

name: Meta
about: Meta (formerly Facebook) connects people through social media and develops virtual reality technologies.

name: Netflix
about: Netflix is a leading streaming service for movies and TV shows worldwide.

name: Tesla
about: Tesla designs and manufactures electric vehicles, batteries, and clean energy products.

name: Nvidia
about: Nvidia is a leader in graphics processing units (GPUs) and AI computing.

name: Adobe
about: Adobe creates software for creatives, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and Acrobat.

name: Salesforce
about: Salesforce is a global leader in customer relationship management (CRM) software.

name: Intel
about: Intel is a major manufacturer of semiconductor chips and processors.

name: IBM
about: IBM provides hardware, software, and consulting services, with a focus on AI and cloud.

name: Oracle
about: Oracle is a leader in database software, cloud solutions, and enterprise software.

name: Cisco
about: Cisco designs and sells networking hardware, software, and telecommunications equipment.

name: Spotify
about: Spotify is a popular music streaming service with millions of tracks and podcasts.

name: Snap
about: Snap Inc. is the parent company of Snapchat, a multimedia messaging app.

name: Twitter
about: Twitter is a social media platform for real-time news and conversations.

name: Uber
about: Uber provides ride-hailing, food delivery, and freight services worldwide.

name: Airbnb
about: Airbnb is an online marketplace for lodging, primarily homestays for vacation rentals.

name: Shopify
about: Shopify offers e-commerce solutions for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems.

name: Zoom
about: Zoom is a leading video conferencing and online meeting platform.

name: Slack
about: Slack is a messaging app for teams, enabling collaboration and communication.

name: Dropbox
about: Dropbox provides cloud storage, file synchronization, and personal cloud services.

name: Atlassian
about: Atlassian develops products for software development, project management, and team collaboration.

name: Pinterest
about: Pinterest is a visual discovery engine for finding ideas like recipes, home decor, and more.

name: LinkedIn
about: LinkedIn is a professional networking platform for career development and job searching.

name: Reddit
about: Reddit is a network of communities based on people's interests.

name: Quora
about: Quora is a question-and-answer website where questions are asked, answered, and edited by users.

name: Yelp
about: Yelp publishes crowd-sourced reviews about businesses, especially restaurants and services.

name: Twitch
about: Twitch is a live streaming platform for gamers and creators.

name: Discord
about: Discord is a voice, video, and text communication platform for communities.

name: TikTok
about: TikTok is a short-form video hosting service for creating and sharing videos.

name: Snapchat
about: Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app popular for its disappearing messages and filters.

name: WhatsApp
about: WhatsApp is a cross-platform messaging and Voice over IP service.

name: Telegram
about: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging, video telephony, and VoIP service.

name: Signal
about: Signal is a secure messaging app with end-to-end encryption.

name: WeChat
about: WeChat is a Chinese multi-purpose messaging, social media, and mobile payment app.

name: Line
about: Line is a communication app for instant messaging on smartphones and computers.

name: Viber
about: Viber is a cross-platform voice over IP and instant messaging software.

name: KakaoTalk
about: KakaoTalk is a South Korean mobile messaging app.

name: Reach Studios
about: Reach Studios is your creative digital studio for innovative projects.

name: ChitterSync
about: ChitterSync connects people and resources for seamless online experiences.

name: Gia
about: Gia is a project by Reach Studios for the best solution for a streaming service providing music, video series, comics, and more all in one place. made to empower creators who want to grow a genuine connection with their audience, created by the team behind ChitterSync.

name: ChitterHaven
about: ChitterHaven is a community-driven platform for sharing and collaboration.

name: JadeConnect
about: JadeConnect is an all-in-one Discord bot for server management.

name: NovanceModding
about: NovanceModding is a modding community and resource hub. made and maintained by the team behind ChitterSync. made to make gaming more fun and enjoyable.
